test_payloads.name: Test 1: Birthday Roast (Milestone)
test_payloads.description: Humorous roast about turning 40, with encouraging undertones

payload.special_message: He just turned 40 and is freaking out about getting old. He used to be the cool guy at the gym, now he complains about his back. Still refuses to use reading glasses.
She just got promoted to VP after 10 years of grinding. Almost gave up last year when she was passed over, but she stuck with it. She earned this.

test_payloads.name: Test 3: Motivational Pep Talk (Life Direction)
test_payloads.description: Tough love for recent grad feeling lost

payload.special_message: He's 22 and just graduated college but feels completely lost. Doesn't know what to do with his life. Sleeping until noon. Needs a serious kick in the pants.

expected_themes: Permission to not have it all figured out

test_payloads.name: Test 4: Advice (Big Decision)
test_payloads.description: Real talk about career risk and entrepreneurship

payload.special_message: She's thinking about quitting her stable corporate job to start her own marketing business. She's scared of failing, but also scared of regret. She has savings for 6 months.
He finally finished his first marathon after training for a year! Hit the wall at mile 20 but pushed through. His time was 4:23 but who cares - he did it!
She's turning 25 and feeling pressure to have everything figured out. Seeing friends get engaged and she's still single. Great job but questioning if it's the right path.

test_payloads.name: Test 7: Encouragement (Health Journey)
test_payloads.description: Support for someone starting weight loss journey

payload.special_message: Starting a weight loss journey after years of putting it off. Down 15 pounds already but it's been tough. Had a bad week and feeling discouraged.

expected_themes: Bad weeks are part of journey

payload.special_message: One year sober today. It's been the hardest year of his life but also the best. He's rebuilding relationships with his family and finally showing up for himself.
The startup is struggling. Funding is tight, customers are slow to convert, and the team is stressed. Feeling like giving up but 3 years of work is on the line.
Engaged but having cold feet. Loves him but worried they argue too much. Wedding is in 4 months. Not sure if it's normal jitters or a real red flag.
